column1: Little Goat Diner////A toffee pork milkshake!? Elvis pancake? Amazin' grace-in' grilled chesse? (OK
column2: that last one I made up - the name
column3: not the sammich. The sammich is all Stephanie or do we call her Chefanie? Sorry
column4: you can tell that I'm all over the cheeseboard here. You would be too if your "grilled cheese bar" was just blown to bits. This sets the new standard for my palate. It's definitely "diner sophisticate" and I'm quite possibly ruined: "smoked gouda & mont amore cheese - guanciale - smoked tomato." And it was HUGE!
